Q_DESC:
Kiruba is an engineering First Year student who wishes to create a software for feed back management. She wants it to be more reallistic. She now want to greet her registered users with proper annotations using a greetings function in C.
Help her to a C program function to read a person name and Greet them as Mr or Ms based on their gender.
The name must be entered with initial otherwise,  display Initial Missing
The gender must be M  or m or f or  F. 
Note :   On any other input issue a diagnostic message,   print   Invalid Input
TESTCASE_1:
S. Irah Pohl
M
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Good Morning Mr. S. Irah Pohl
